Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The most common regimens were 3TC + d4T + nevirapine ( NVP ) ( 54 . 8 % ) , zidovudine ( AZT ) + 3TC + NVP ( 14 . 5 % ) , 3TC + d4T + efavirenz ( EFV ) ( 20 . 1 % ) , and AZT + 3TC + EFV ( 5 . 4 % ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. 3TC ( Lamivudine ) is an antiretroviral medication used in the treatment of HIV and Hepatitis B. It is used in combination with other antiretroviral drugs to help control the virus. 
2. d4T ( Stavudine ) is an antiretroviral medication used in the treatment of HIV. It is used in combination with other antiretroviral drugs to help control the virus.
3. Nevirapine ( NVP ) is an antiretroviral medication used in the treatment of HIV. It is used to prevent and treat HIV infection and to prevent mother-to-child transmission of HIV.
4. Zidovudine ( AZT ) is an antiretroviral medication used in the treatment of HIV and AIDS. It is used to help control the virus and prevent mother-to-child transmission of HIV.
5. Efavirenz ( EFV ) is an antiretroviral medication used in the treatment of HIV and AIDS. It is used to help control the virus and prevent mother-to-child transmission of HIV.

Therefore, the entities in the paragraph that represent diseases or medical conditions are HIV and AIDS. The other entities are medications used to treat these diseases.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
